name: Aesop
effects: Increase horsemanship and houndmaster by 5 and makes it easier to sneak up on animals for 24 hours
enhancedEffects: Animals take less notice of you and dogs don't bark at you.
ingredients: Belladonna x1, Boar’s Tusk x1, Comfrey x2
steps: Add 2 Comfrey to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Boar’s Tusk to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Belladonna to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Prepare phial and distill

name: Aqua Vitalis
effects: Lose 50% less Health and slows bleeding by 50% for 10 minutes
enhancedEffects: At higher quality, further reduces health loss and bleeding rate
ingredients: Dandelion x2, Marigold x1
steps: Add 2 Dandelion to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Marigold to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Prepare phial and distill
acquisition: Can be purchased from Aranka in the Nomads’ Camp, Herbalist Barnaby north of Trosky Castle, or the apothecary in Kuttenberg

name: Witch Potion
effects: Induces hallucinations and anxiety.
ingredients: Marigold x1, Belladonna x1, Herb Paris x1
steps: Boil Herb Paris for one turn > Grind Marigold and add to cauldron > Boil for one more turn > Grind Belladonna and add to cauldron (do not boil) > Distill.

name: Artemisia
effects: Increase Strength by 4 and lower attack and block stamina cost -25% for 10 minutes
ingredients: Wormwood x2, Sage x1
steps: Add 1 Sage to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 2 Wormwood to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Prepare phial and distill

name: Bane Poison
effects: Makes running impossible and reduces Health by 110 in 30s
ingredients: Amanita Muscaria x1, Belladonna x2, Wormwood x1
steps: Add 1 Wormwood to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 2 Belladonna to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn using bellows > Add 1 Amanita Muscaria to the cauldron > Prepare phial and distill

name: Bowman's Brew
effects: Increase marksmanship by 5 and slows stamina loss when aiming by 50% for 10 minutes
enhancedEffects: Reduces stamina loss while aiming further and boosts accuracy slightly.
ingredients: Eyebright x2, St. John's Wort x1
steps: Add 2 Eyebright to the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 1 St. John's Wort to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn using bellows > Prepare phial and distill

name: Buck’s Blood
effects: Increase stamina by 30% and stamina regen by 15% for 40 minutes
ingredients: St. John's Wort x1, Dandelion x1, Comfrey x1
steps: Add 1 St. John's Wort to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Comfrey to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Dandelion to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn using bellows > Pour into phial

name: Chamomile Decoction
effects: Sleep heals 4 times faster and restores energy 2 times faster for 24 hours
enhancedEffects: Energy replenishes faster while sleeping and resistance to fatigue improves.
ingredients: Chamomile x2, Sage x1
steps: Add 2 Chamomile to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Sage to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Cockerel
effects: Increase energy by 20 and decrease energy use by 20% for 12 hours
ingredients: Mint x2, Valerian x1
steps: Add 2 Mint to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Valerian to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Prepare phial and distill

name: Digestive Potion
effects: Increase Vitality by 2, cure food poisoning, and decrease nourishment by 20 for 10 minutes
enhancedEffects: Cures any poisoning and boosts vitality.
ingredients: Charcoal x1, Nettle x1, Thistle x2
steps: Add 2 Thistle to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Nettle to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Charcoal to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Dollmaker Poison
effects: Makes running impossible, reduces all weapon skills by 4, reduces Health by 30 slowly
ingredients: Herb Paris x2, Valerian x1
steps: Add 2 Herb Paris to the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 1 Valerian to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Prepare phial and distill

name: Embrocation
effects: Increase Agility by 4 and sprinting costs 20% less stamina for 15 minutes
ingredients: Boar’s Tusk x1, Eyebright x1, Poppy x1, Valerian x1
steps: Add 1 Poppy and 1 Valerian to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Eyebright to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Boar’s Tusk to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Pour into phial

name: Fever Tonic
effects: Cures fever
ingredients: Elderberry Leaves x1, Feverfew x3, Ginger x2
steps: Add 3 Feverfew to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Elderberry Leaves to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 2 Ginger to the cauldron > Prepare phial and distill

name: Fox
effects: Increase speech by 5 and increase reading speed for 24 hours
ingredients: Belladonna x1, Charcoal x1, Nettle x1, St. John’s Wort x1
steps: Add 1 St. John’s Wort and 1 Nettle to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Charcoal to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Belladonna to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Pour into phial

name: Hair o’ the Dog
effects: Remove drunkenness and hangover
ingredients: Mint x1, Sage x1, St. John’s Wort x1
steps: Add 1 Sage and 1 St. John’s Wort to the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 1 Mint to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Lead Shot Gunpowder
effects: Used for crafting ammunition
ingredients: Charcoal x1, Saltpetre x1, Sulphur x1
steps: Add 1 Sulphur and 1 Saltpetre to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Charcoal to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Pour into a mortar and grind

name: Lethean Water
effects: Resets all perks
ingredients: Belladonna x1, Henbane x1, Wormwood x2
steps: Add 2 Wormwood to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Belladonna to the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 1 Henbane to the cauldron > Prepare phial and distill
notes: Resets all perks; use with caution as this action is irreversible.

name: Lion Perfume
effects: Increase charisma by 7 for 5 minutes
ingredients: Mint x2, Sage x2
steps: Add 2 Sage to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 2 Mint to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Lullaby
effects: Reduce stamina and stamina regen by 30%, reduce energy to 0, and reduce perception for 12 hours
ingredients: Herb Paris x1, Poppy x1, Thistle x1
steps: Add 1 Poppy to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Thistle to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Herb Paris to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Marigold Decoction
effects: Heals 40% of Health over 60s and hangover is cured instantly
ingredients: Marigold x2, Nettle x1
steps: Add 1 Nettle to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 2 Marigold to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Mintha Perfume
effects: Increase charisma by 3 for 30 minutes
ingredients: Dandelion x3, Marigold x1, Mint x1
steps: Add 3 Dandelion and 1 Mint to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Marigold to the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn using bellows > Prepare phial and distill

name: Moonshine
effects: Alcohol
ingredients: Mint x2, Wormwood x2
steps: Add 2 Wormwood to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 2 Mint to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Prepare phial and distill

name: Nighthawk
effects: Energy decreases 50% slower at night and see better in the dark for 20 minutes
ingredients: Belladonna x1, Chamomile x1, Eyebright x2
steps: Add 2 Eyebright to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Belladonna to the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 1 Chamomile to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial

name: Painkiller Brew
effects: Maximum stamina decrease from Health loss decreases by 50% and suppresses effects from injuries for 20 minutes
ingredients: Comfrey x1, Marigold x1, Poppy x3
steps: Add 3 Poppy to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Add 1 Marigold to the cauldron and boil for 1 turn using bellows > Add 1 Comfrey to the cauldron and boil for 2 turns > Prepare phial and distill

name: Quickfinger
effects: Increase craftsmanship and thievery by 6 for 40 minutes
ingredients: Cobweb x1, Eyebright x2, Valerian x2
steps: Add 1 Cobweb and 2 Eyebright to the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 2 Valerian to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Pour into phial

name: Saviour Schnapps
effects: Increase strength, agility, vitality by 2 for 5 minutes
ingredients: Belladonna x2, Nettle x1
steps: Add 1 Nettle to the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 2 Belladonna to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Pour into phial

qualityLevels.weak: Saves game with potential side effects.
qualityLevels.strong: Saves game and grants temporary stat boost.
qualityLevels.Henry quality: Saves game, grants stat boost, and additional perk.

name: Scattershot Powder
effects: Used for crafting ammunition
ingredients: Leached Charcoal x1, Saltpetre x1, Sulphur x1
steps: Add 1 Sulphur and 1 Saltpetre to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 3 turns > Add 1 Leached Charcoal to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 1 turn > Pour into a mortar and grind

name: Soap
effects: Use to wash clothes
ingredients: Charcoal x1, Dandelion x1, Thistle x2
steps: Add 2 Thistle to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Boil for 2 turns > Add 1 Dandelion to the cauldron and boil for 1 turn > Add 1 Charcoal to the mortar, grind, and pour into the cauldron > Pour into phial
